data.title: Leaders of social justice and their Angel asteroids
data.meta_description: I researched this a while ago and looked at thsesÂ asteroids:  Angel 11911 Angelica 965 Gabriella 355 Raphela 708 Michel 1348 Oriola 701 Saint Michel 9395 Soulie 13226
data.text:
Post by Deleted on

I researched this a while ago and looked at thses asteroids:

Angel 11911

Angelica 965

Gabriella 355

Raphela 708

Michel 1348

Oriola 701

Saint Michel 9395

Soulie 13226

DNA 55555

Cydonia 1106

----

11911, 965,355,708,1348,701, 9395, 13226, 55555, 1106

Logos 58534 - divine animating principle pervading the Universe

Horus 1924

Knight 29391

Wisdom 3402

Spirit 37452

Aura 1488

Psyche 16

Alma 390

58534, 1924, 29391, 3402, 37452, 1488, 16, 390

Also checked fixed stars.

_______________________________________________________

REVOLUTIONARIES - those who participated in and/or led political struggles.

Che Guevara - Argentinian Marxist revolutionary

Asc - Aries 6Â° conj Uranus

Logos conj Sun (0)

Venus conj Saint Michel (0) sextile Moon (0)

Oriola and Aldebaran conj NN (1), trine Horus (0)

Alma/Aura conj IC (0)

Grand trine - GC, Jupiter, Neptune

Martin Luther King - (so many aspects, to pick a few ain't easy)

Asc - Taurus 13Â°

Saturn at GC semisextile Sun at MC

Saturn conjunct Angel (1), quintile Angelica (0)

Grand trine - Pallas, Mars, Raphaela

Oriola conj IC (1)

Logos conj Gabriella (1) - Ist house

Horus conj Jupiter (1)

Rosa Parks

Asc - Cap - 19.49

Raphaela conj Sun/Wisdom in 1st

Pallas conj MC (1)

Mars conj Asc (1)

SN conj Saint Michel (1)

NN conj Spirit/Venus (1) sextile Uranus (0)

Oriola conj Pluto

Horus sextile Psyche (0)

Angel square Rigel (0)

Mercury trine Alderbaran, square MC (0)

Gandhi

Asc - Libra 26Â° conj Gabriella (0)

Saturn at GA

Cydonia conj Vertex and Uranus (0)

Grand trine - Moon, Angel, Neptune

Spirit (in 1st) sextile Saint Michel (0), trine Logos (0)

Vedic asteroids - Mahakala/Tara conj Moon exact

Vibhuti conj Asc

Nelson Mandela

Asc - Sag 21Â° conjunct NN and DNA exact. NN is Direct. (Wow!)

Asc/DNA/NN sextile Angelica (0)

Venus conj DC (1) trine Angelica (1)

Oriola conj Sun (1)

Moon opp Rafaela (0) trine Michel (0)

Logos conj Vertex (1)

Horus conj Jupiter (0)

Yod with Saint Michel and Angel at base, & Mercury/Saturn at tip

Julian Assange - political activist, whistle blower

Asc - Sag 5.22

Gabriellla conjunct NN (0). NN is Direct.

Neptune conjunct DC

Oriola sextile Sun (0) opp Pluto (0)

Raphaela: conjunct Soulie (0) trine MC (0)

Michel: sextile Cydonia (0) trine St Michel (0)

Saturn sextile Spirit trine Knight (all exact - forming one end of a kite pattern) - this seems to say that he was a do gooder in a past life.

Horus sextile Asc (0) and sextile Mercury (1) (which is trine ASC)

We now have 3 people with Direct NNs. Very rare indeed!

____________________________________________________

POLITICAL ACTIVISTS and WRITERS - this group consists of people who proposed change through their writings.

Amartya Sen - nobel winner development economist

Asc - Pisces 25.22

MC conj Venus (0) and GC (1), sextile NN

Sun conj Michel (1) and Raphaela (0)

Michel/ Raphaela sextile Neptune/Saint Michel

Gabriella at DC

Angel conj Knight

Karl Marx

Asc - Aqua 23Â°..

Rafaela conj Sun (0) trine Jupiter (0)

Saturn conj Soulie/ Pallas/ Anti-vertex (all at 15Â° in 1st house) semisextile Cydonia

Angelica conj MC (1)

Oriol conj Venus (2)

Noam Chomsky - political activist and writer - known as America's greatest intellectual

Angel conj Asc - 12Â° Sag - the Great Attractor (in 1928)

Sun conj Asc (2) square Cydonia (0)

NN Direct trine MC/Aura

IC at Aries point

Mercury conj Antares (1) sextile Raphael (0) and Pallas (1)

Grand cross - Moon, Venus, Horus, Vertex

Spirit sextile Logos exact

Noam Chomsky appears to have a Starseed profile!

Sri Aurobindo - political activist, writer, one of India's most revered spiritual leaders

Asc - Leo 13Â° conjunct Jupiter exact - (same degree as my Asc )

Pallas at GA (0) sextile Raphaela

Moon conj GC (1) trine Neptune

Horus conj Alma (0) - 1st house

NN conj Aldebaran (1)

Vedic asteroids - many aspects

Shiva conj IC (0)

Rudra conj DC (0)

Uranus conj Parvati/Sita

Huge gender imbalance here. I need to find some women revolutionaries with known birth times.

Post by whisperix on

@astrokeen

Thank you that you brought this article here!

I have read it long time ago and wanted to ask.

What should I do when my first name asteroid is the same of an angel asteroid. Do I need to look for another asteroid?

My children do have KnightRx conjunct the DC - orb1'31''. May I ask: How I should interpret this asteroid?

Post by Deleted on

What should I do when my first name asteroid is the same of an angel asteroid. Do I need to look for another asteroid?

My children do have KnightRx conjunct the DC - orb1'31''. May I ask: How I should interpret this asteroid?

That same name is a tricky one, as you can't be sure what it represents unless in synastry. Try another angel asteroid, yes.

If the dsc indicates unconscious, karmic mission that drives our interpersonal connections, then your children (both have these?) would be attracted to do-gooders, which is very nice. With knight being rx, it may mean that their idea of a do-gooder could be very subjective and differ from others.

Post by whisperix on

@astrokeen said:

What should I do when my first name asteroid is the same of an angel asteroid. Do I need to look for another asteroid?

My children do have KnightRx conjunct the DC - orb1'31''. May I ask: How I should interpret this asteroid?

That same name is a tricky one, as you can't be sure what it represents unless in synastry. Try another angel asteroid, yes.

If the dsc indicates unconscious, karmic mission that drives our interpersonal connections, then your children (both have these?) would be attracted to do-gooders, which is very nice. With knight being rx, it may mean that their idea of a do-gooder could be very subjective and differ from others.

Thank you for the information!

Yes, I do raise twins. They are 4 minutes apart.

Post by Deleted on

The people listed above seems to have at least 2 or 3 angel/spiritual asteroids aspecting their angles, luminaries or planets particularly Saturn or Jupiter. Saturn shows a karmic influence and is similar to DNA is some respects. MLK has Saturn conj Angel, Gandhi has Saturn at the GA.

4 people out of 10 have direct NN.

It would be fun to see if we share any common aspects (or none) with these greats. I'll list a selection of mine here:

Asc - 13.49 Leo

Saturn/St. Michel square Moon (0)

NN semi-sext Raphaela (0)

Pallas at GC trine Jupiter (0)

Wisdom conj Mars

Horus quincunx Logos (0)

Spirit at SGC

And a whole bunch of Gods at the GA - Isis/Osiris/Apollo/Sekhmet

Key Vedic asteroids

Antares conj Vishnu

Uranus conj Sita - same as Sri Aurobindo

Balakrishna conj Asc.

Post by lumina on

WEll not that I am a revolutionary or leader, but I have

Soulie conjunct MC in Libra - 2 degrees

Angelica in Scorpio in 12th opposping St Michel in Taurus in 6th - 2 degrees

Grabriella in scorpio in 11th, conjunct Lancelot and some others and closing a Grand trine with Juno and Raphaela in Pisces and Saturn in Cancer (all within 2 degrees)

Angel and Wisdom (and Lust ) both conjunct my ASC on 7 Sagittarius exact

also conjunct Mars on 5 Sag

conjunct Neptune-NN on 9-10 Sag more widely

(Neptune-NN on Antares)

Sun conjunct Mercury on the GC

Oriola in Aries in 4th trine Sun-MErcury - 1 degree

Cydonia conjunct Perspehone in Virgo in 9th, opposing Jupiter - 1 degree

Knight conjunct Vesta on 1 Cap in 1st house exact, sextile Uranus on 11th house cusp on 1 Scorpio

Spirit on 10 Cap widely conjunct Venus on 6 Cap and Isis-Osiris on 8 Cap (and Guinevere on 10 Cap. lol), sextile Jupiter, but also square Pluto

Psyche on 24 Aqua at the end of 2nd house, conjunct mean Lilith on 24 Aqua exact and sextile Sun-Mercury to one side and Oriola to the other side.

Pallas on 9 Aquarius trine Pluto on 9 Libra sextile Neptune-NN on 9-10 Sag

HOrus on 8 Pisces conjunct Ceres on 9 Pisces conjunct Jupiter on 11 PIsces, sextile Isis-Osiris on 8 Cap, conjunct Ishtar on 8 Pisces opposing Hekate on 8 Virgo and then some. lol

Aura is conjunct my IC by just 10 minutes of orb, conjunct Alma by 2 degrees, and Gaea as well (and Magion, for what it`s worth. lol)

Interesting that I have Soulie on 6 Libra and Alma on 6 Aries and my MC is on 5 Libra.

I think Compassion is either on MC or IC as well

Logos on 3 Leo in 8th house conjunct Priapus on 00 Leo (and Hypnos on 6 Leo), is part of a Grand trine with Amor-Mars 2-5 Sag and of course Aura-IC on 4 Aries, also squares Uranus on 1 Scorpio though.

I think most striking of these I find

Angel-Wisdom on my ASC

the minor triangle of Pallas-Pluto-Neptune/NN

Aura-Alma-Gaea-(Magion) on IC as part of a Grand trine with Amor-Mars (on ASC) and Logos.

Post by Deleted on

Would like to take this further and check if other asteroids for heroic actions or taking a stand might be predominant in their charts. Please feel free to add any asteroids you wish to.

I think these might be important:

1868 Thersites - a Greek free speech hero

"Thersites, the only common soldier mentioned by Homer in the Iliad, must have been an extraordinary man, for he had the guts to tell his comrades, their king Agamemnon and his officers, that they had been sent on a fool's errand, chasing after a silly twit named Helen who ran off with young Paris................ And for his pains Thersites was savagely beaten by Odysseus, killed by Achilles, and portrayed by the aristophile Homer in the most calculated, cruel and derisive manner, all for telling the simple truth. " www.networkcentralca.net/thersites.htm

8990 Compassion - this is self-explanatory. People demanding justice for the poor, marginalised or oppressed must have this quality.

Post by Ava on

@astrokeen said:

1868 Thersites - a Greek free speech hero

"Thersites, the only common soldier mentioned by Homer in the Iliad, must have been an extraordinary man, for he had the guts to tell his comrades, their king Agamemnon and his officers, that they had been sent on a fool's errand, chasing after a silly twit named Helen who ran off with young Paris................ And for his pains Thersites was savagely beaten by Odysseus, killed by Achilles, and portrayed by the aristophile Homer in the most calculated, cruel and derisive manner, all for telling the simple truth. " www.networkcentralca.net/thersites.htm

Great find! Thank you.

I have this asteroid on my ascendant.

edit

Post by FruityLlama on

I looked at Logos in my chart because it means 'reason' in modern greek. In asteroid terms I like to think of this as being 'reasonable'.

I have it trine my moon and square pluto, Angel sextile my sun and squares Venus exact, Thersites sextile moon, Truth sextiles my Uranus and trine Pluto- I find this the most interesting because I think it describes my attitude well. Compassion is conjunct my sun in the 11th.

Pallas doesn't do an awful lot, but I am a 'Classical Liberal'. One of my favourite classical liberal commentators has Pallas on their Sun though!

Its hard to sift through to get to the truth when there is so much crap in the media and so many different agendas going on.

Post by Deleted on

Ava , very interesting aspects you've got. As you said, Thersites is significant for those who will stick their necks out and take a beating for it, if it comes to that. I believe he first stood up in the Greek assembly to voice his dissension, which given his commoner background, was unheard of.

I have it conjunct my Sun and I was, through my teens and early twenties in particular, the person who belled the cat. I spoke out in public when others thought it more judicious to keep silent. Now, I keep the speaking out only for very important issues.

FruityLlama , you seem to have lovely asteroids prominent in your chart . Logos has an alternative meaning as well. Logos in Christianity is understood to represent Christ, divinty or the Angel of the lord.

"In Christology, the Logos (Greek: ÎÏÎ³Î¿Ï, lit. ''Word", "Discourse", or "Reason'') is a name or title of Jesus Christ, derived from the prologue to the Gospel of John (c 100) "In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God".

"The Logos is God active in creation, revelation, and redemption. Jesus Christ not only gives God's Word to us humans; he is the Word."

en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Logos_(Christianity)

Logos is very slow moving, however, and can be generational if conjunct outer planets. And since it is slow moving, aspects must be kept tight.
